QuestData.Title: Drust in Time
QuestData.Description:
A few days ago, a band of Alliance researchers that called themselves the "Explorers' League" took a contingent of Kul Tiran soldiers to the old Drust ruins down the road.
We haven't really heard from them since, and I'm growing a bit concerned. I can't leave my post, so can you check up on the team?
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Explorers' League members at the Thovas Base-Camp.
